job.title: Software Engineer IV
job.description: strongAre You the Right Fit brbrstrongVisual Lease is an industryleading comprehensive lease accounting solution that helps customers maintain their lease portfolios and achieve compliance with lease accounting standards Our talented engineering team delivers new features and applications on top of our SaaS platform on an iterative basis Our crossfunctional delivery teams are made up of software engineers quality engineers product managers and usability designers all working collaboratively to deliver on our roadmap vision Visual Lease is looking for an innovative and collaborative lead software engineer to join our fastgrowing engineering teambrbrAs part of a team developing new application features improvements and product evolutions you will work across the application stack to develop UI code business logic in Microservices and develop in our relational databases SQL Server and Aurora PostgreSQL Daily you will work sidebyside with crossfunctional team members to understand requirements prepare feature designs write code in Cnet and Python support testing and ultimately releases into our AWS cloud environmentsbrulliWoodbridge NJ Location but will consider remote candidates in the following states NJ NY WA TX SC NC PA NH MA IL GA CO AZ MD RI and FLliliPlease note that sponsorship is not available for this positionbrliulstronguWhat You Will DobrbrustrongParticipate in the software development process through the entire system life cycle includingbrulliReview roadmap requirements discuss with stakeholders and document designsliliProvide handson technical team leadership for planning estimating designing and delivery of features for each releaseliliConduct research build proofofconcepts and lead technical decisionmaking discussionsliliDevelop new features and improvements for the platformliliCreate and maintain reliable unit and integration testsliliWrite and maintain technical documentationliliProvide timesensitive engineering support investigating customerreported issuesliliWork closely with development architecture product management and quality e assurance colleagues to build the expected functionality with qualityliliFollows our engineering standards and best practicesliliMentors more junior EngineersbrliulstronguSkills amp CompetenciesustrongulliA Bachelors Degree in Computer Science or equivalentlili10 years of full stack software engineering experience in an agile environment and knowledge of applicable design patterns preferably for modern SaaS applicationslili7 years of objectoriented development with CNETliliMinimum 2 years of experience with Modern JavaScript frameworkslibraries Angular liliMinimum 1 year of experience with PythonliliHands on experience with RDBMS like MS SQL Server PostgreSQL with the ability to create complex SQL queries and performance tuningliliExperience withliulliEmbedded BI tools such as AWS QuickSight Microsoft BI Pentaho Exago BI LookerliliUnit Test frameworks such as xUnit and TDD Test Driven DevelopmentliulliSolid understanding of data structures and algorithmsliliMastery of fullstack Application ArchitectureliulliMicroservices and RESTful API DevelopmentliliContainers and Serverless architectureliulliWorking knowledge of Trunk Based Development and source control tools such as GIT liliStrong advocate of Shift Left testing principles and apply them during development processliliCulturally the ideal candidate will fit into a team if they possess strong collaboration ownership and a passion for innovationliliAWS Solutions Architect certification PCPP Certified Professional in Python is a plus brliulstrong Why Work at Visual Lease brbrstrongWe have a passion for simplifying the complex Our lease accounting and lease administration software helps companies manage analyze and report on their leased asset portfolios Loved by more than 700 major companies worldwide our cloudbased SaaS platform embeds decades of lease management and financial accounting expertisebrbrOver the last two years our employee base has seen significant growth Voted one of NJs Best Places to Work we are looking for driven innovative and passionate teamplayers to help us continue this journey and bring us to the next levelbrbrVisual Lease is an Equal OpportunityAffirmative Action Employer All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race color religion sex sexual orientation gender identity national origin disability veteran status or other characteristics protected by law Visual Lease is a background screening drugfree workplace Fulltime positions offer a competitive benefits package and salary commensurate with experiencebrbrwwwvisualleasecombrbr
